Valueless stones & unimagined gems
And caverns of columnar stone, w like jet on chrystalline columns poised
With vegetable silver overspread
Fount Wells of unfathomed fire, & watersprings
Whence the great Sea, even as a child, is fed
Whose vapours clothe Earth's mount monarch mountain-tops
With kingly, ermine snow; see, as they flas250

zone.line: They And make appear the melancholy ruins
Of cancelled cycles; anchors, beaks of ships
Planks turned to marble, quivers helms & spears,
And gorgon-headed targes, & the wheels
Of scythed chariots, & the emblazonry
Of trophies standards & armorial beasts
Round which Death laughed, sepulchered emblems
Of dead Destruction, ruin within ruin!
The wrecks beside of many a city vast
Whose population which the Earth grew over
Was mortal but not human, see, they lie
Thier monstrous works & uncouth skeletons,
Thier once Heaven-cleaving pyramids & domes statues, fan homes, & fanes; prodigious shapes
Huddled in grey annihilation, split,
Jammed in the hard black deep; & over these
